explanations.a: Sound waves are not transverse in gases; they are longitudinal.
explanations.b: Correct. In air and most media, sound waves are longitudinal.
explanations.c: Incorrect. Electromagnetic waves do not require a medium.

questions.question: For longitudinal waves, the particles in the medium

answers.a: Vibrate parallel to the direction of propagation of the wave
answers.b: Vibrate perpendicular to the direction of propagation of the wave

explanations.a: Correct. This is the defining characteristic of longitudinal waves.
explanations.b: This applies to transverse waves, not longitudinal.
explanations.c: Incorrect. Particles do vibrate in longitudinal waves.
